briefTitle: Safety and Reactogenicity of GlaxoSmithKline (GSK) Biologicals' IPV Vaccine (PoliorixTM) in Toddlers
officialTitle: An Open-label Study to Assess the Safety and Reactogenicity of GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals' Inactivated Poliomyelitis Vaccine Poliorix Administered as a Booster Dose at 18-24 Months of Age in Healthy Toddlers in China.
summary: The study will evaluate the safety and reactogenicity of PoliorixTM given as a single booster dose to Chinese children at 18-24 months of age.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With Any and Grade 3 Solicited Local Symptoms
